attributes.action: Hold a government enquiry into the Oldham Grooming Gangs.
attributes.additional_details: Start a full transparent government enquiry in to the Oldham and other similar grooming gangs
attributes.background: With the government rejecting Oldham councils application to hold a government enquiry in to the Oldham and other similar grooming gangs. The public deserve to know the full truth via a full official parliamentary enquiry

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
